description: Detects process patterns found in Cobalt Strike beacon activity (see reference for more details) Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Other programs that cause these patterns (please report)
name: CobaltStrike Process Patterns
query: ((process.command_line:*\\cmd.exe\ \/C\ whoami* AND process.parent.executable:C\:\\Temp*) OR (process.command_line:*conhost.exe\ 0xffffffff\ \-ForceV1* AND process.parent.command_line:(*\/C\ whoami* OR *cmd.exe\ \/C\ echo* OR *\ >\ \\.\\pipe*)) OR (process.command_line:(*cmd.exe\ \/c\ echo* OR *>\ \\.\\pipe* OR *\\whoami.exe*) AND process.parent.executable:*\\dllhost.exe) OR (process.executable:*\\cmd.exe AND process.parent.executable:*\\runonce.exe AND process.parent.command_line:*\\runonce.exe))
